long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest screen recorder extension to use.

Easy Screen Recorder extension helps you record video from the computer's screen, tabs, windows or camera only. 

On screen recording, it can show a bubble camera and you can customize it with many options such as change size, shape, position,...
After recording, you can download video at .webm format. To convert it to other formats like .mp4, please use another convert tool after download video.
